profile.name: Lelouch vi Britannia
profile.bio: Revolutionary strategist and tactical genius. Wielder of the Power of Absolute Obedience. Fighting for a world where the weak are not oppressed.

details: Founded and led the Black Knights resistance organization against Britannian Empire
Orchestrated the liberation of Japan through strategic military operations
Unified resistance groups across the globe under a single command structure
Achieved chairman position of the United Federation of Nations
Seized the throne through strategic manipulation and Geass
Implemented sweeping reforms to dismantle the aristocracy
Executed the Zero Requiem plan to bring world peace
United the world against a common enemy to end conflict
Maintained perfect academic standing while leading a double life
Organized school festivals and cultural events
Protected the identity of exiled royalty while attending classes

projects.title: Zero Requiem
projects.description: The ultimate plan to end all conflict by uniting the world against a common enemy, achieving lasting peace through sacrifice.

projects.title: Black Knights Formation
projects.description: Created a revolutionary military organization from scattered resistance groups, becoming the world's most powerful independent army.

projects.title: United Federation of Nations
projects.description: Diplomatic achievement uniting 47 nations against the Britannian Empire, establishing a democratic world order.

projects.title: Geass Strategic Applications
projects.description: Mastered the Power of Absolute Obedience, developing tactical frameworks for its ethical and strategic deployment.

projects.title: Operation Black Rebellion
projects.description: First major offensive against Britannian forces in Area 11, demonstrating tactical superiority despite numerical disadvantage.

projects.title: Chess AI Development
projects.description: Developed unbeatable chess strategies by treating battles like games, achieving victory against noble opponents.

quotes: The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
If the king doesn't move, then his subjects won't follow.
What do you do when there is an evil you cannot defeat by just means?
I will not repent. This is my path, and I will walk it to the end.
